hardcoded_faqs.question: Q: What types of courses are available on Zohacous?
hardcoded_faqs.answer: Zohacous offers a wide range of tech courses, including Web Development, App Development, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, Data Science, Cybersecurity, and more. Our courses are designed to cater to all levels, from beginners to advanced.
